name: Addon Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
overview:
Addon Solutions - is an ISO 9001:2008 certified Custom Web Application Development Company. With more than 100 employees, it has marched to achieve new highs. The firm has proven skills in Custom Software Development, Web Design & Development, Ecommerce Solutions, CMS Solutions, Offshore staffing & development, Website Maintenance & support, Web Promotions, SEO and internet marketing.

Addon Solutions Expertise

  1. Web-Development (a) Php Web Development (b) Asp.net Web Development (c) Java Web Development (d) Open Source Web Development

  2. Mobile Application Development (a) iPhone Apps Development (b) Blackberry Apps Development (c) Android Apps Development (d) Symbian Apps Development
